text: Either war is obsolete, or men are.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

text: Ah, lives of men! When prosperous they glitter - Like a fair picture when misfortune comes - A wet sponge at one blow has blurred the painting.
author: Aeschylus

text: Men do not shape destiny, Destiny produces the man for the hour.
author: Fidel Castro

text: Married men live longer than single men. But married men are a lot more willing to die.
author: Johnny Carson

text: Is it not rather what we expect in men, that they should have numerous strands of experience lying side by side and never compare them with each other?
author: George Eliot
